object.name: ExternalReplyInfo
object.description: This object contains information about a message that is being replied to, which may come from another chat or forum topic.
object.html_description: This object contains information about a message that is being replied to, which may come from another chat or forum topic.
object.rst_description: This object contains information about a message that is being replied to, which may come from another chat or forum topic.

annotations.description: Origin of the message replied to by the given message
annotations.html_description: Origin of the message replied to by the given message
annotations.rst_description: Origin of the message replied to by the given message
annotations.name: origin

annotations.description: Chat the original message belongs to. Available only if the chat is a supergroup or a channel.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Chat the original message belongs to. Available only if the chat is a supergroup or a channel.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Chat the original message belongs to. Available only if the chat is a supergroup or a channel.
annotations.name: chat

annotations.description: Unique message identifier inside the original chat. Available only if the original chat is a supergroup or a channel.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Unique message identifier inside the original chat. Available only if the original chat is a supergroup or a channel.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Unique message identifier inside the original chat. Available only if the original chat is a supergroup or a channel.
annotations.name: message_id

annotations.description: Options used for link preview generation for the original message, if it is a text message
annotations.html_description: Optional. Options used for link preview generation for the original message, if it is a text message
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Options used for link preview generation for the original message, if it is a text message
annotations.name: link_preview_options

annotations.description: Message is an animation, information about the animation
annotations.html_description: Optional. Message is an animation, information about the animation
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Message is an animation, information about the animation
annotations.name: animation

annotations.description: Message is a general file, information about the file

annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Message is a general file, information about the file
annotations.name: document

annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Message contains paid media; information about the paid media
annotations.name: paid_media

annotations.description: Message is a photo, available sizes of the photo

annotations.description: True, if the message media is covered by a spoiler animation
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the message media is covered by a spoiler animation
